# backascout-image



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property           | Attribute    | Description                                                                                                                | Type                          | Default     |
| ------------------ | ------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alt`              | `alt`        | Alternative text for image                                                                                                 | `string`                      | `undefined` |
| `loading`          | `loading`    | The the loading method for the image                                                                                       | `"auto" \| "eager" \| "lazy"` | `'lazy'`    |
| `mediumSet`        | `medium-set` | Specifies the path to the image served to medium sized medias (between 600 and 1024 px)                                    | `string`                      | `undefined` |
| `smallSet`         | `small-set`  | Specifies the path to the image served to small medias (below 600 px)                                                      | `string`                      | `undefined` |
| `src` _(required)_ | `src`        | Specifies the path to the image that will be served to larger medias (above 1024 px) and as a fallback for legacy browsers | `string`                      | `undefined` |
| `variant`          | `variant`    | Adds variant of the image                                                                                                  | `"default" \| "scalable"`     | `undefined` |
